hiveArticle.title: B&W Photo Contest: Food - Indian Meal - 1st Entry
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> This is my first entry to the B&W Photo Contest by @daveks and Judged by @gringalicious</center>
<hr>

# <center>Indian Meal - Puri, Chana, Banana Chips and Halwa</center>

<hr>

<hr>

# <center> Camera - Nokia 6 Back Camera, 16 MP</center>

<hr>

## <center> "When I stopped eating meat, I fell in love with East Indian food - there's so much selection, and they use the most beautiful spices." - Laura Mennell </center>

<hr>
